Text: ENJOY ENJOY ENJOY ENJOY Omerta City of Gangsters New Patch v1.3.0 MULTi7 Exclusive with Steam-Rip version as well by RG Gameworks!

its not work with GOG version
I keep getting "The program can't start because binkw32.dll is missing from your computer. Try reinstalling the program to fix this problem." I've tried reinstalling

for those that are having troubles navigating in russian,you can change language with launcher.exe in your main game folder,then on the left side you have 4 boxes you can tick,tick the one with the longest name ,it starts with capital A
then to start the game in english click the left box on the right. voila,english! :)
